news: Presidential candidate Robert F. Kennedy was just banned from the Schlog at 23:40 PM on the 13th of October. Mister Kennedy supposedly choked on a banana peel whilst stuttering like he regularly does, only to reveal whilst choking to death that he wasn't actually THE Robert F. Kennedy but an impostor, and most likely, somebody on the site... So, one question remains. Who is the impostor? W-w-was i-t m-mm-me? Nah. In your dreams, mate.
